item.title: Use WordPress to build a static website and host it on AWS for (practically) free.
item.description: AWS and WordPress can go together well Introduction Many people are using WordPress today to host websites that are primarily static. item.title: Agile has become a Cargo Cult
item.description: caption To be clear, I think the (Agile Manifesto)[https://agilemanifesto.org/] was a great step forward. But in the 19 years since its inscription, “Agile” has basically become the de facto “software development process” primarily based on its promise to deliver software faster. I’ve recently posted about Cargo Cult - a descriptor for the act of following a process without understanding why the process leads to the desired result.
